attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
sir
I have been reading and hearing what RBS are saying about their bonuses.

they calim that, if they are stopped from paying theses bonuses to their senior staff, they would go elsewhere.

perhaps they could be recommended to go to India, greece, ireland, iceland, Dubai, to name but a few.

as the bank is 70% tax payers money, if I were in charge and they said that to me i'd sack the lot, pay off the account holders and close the bank, saving the tax payer money

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
